author: craigmcc
msg: Ensure that the portlet API, avalon-framework, and logkit jars are not
included in the sample application wars.
Move LICENSE.txt and NOTICE.txt for the sample apps to
src/main/resources/META-INF.  This still puts them inside the webapp (in
WEB-INF/classes/META-INF) but that's not as bad as at WEB-INF/classes.

author: jdillon
msg: Use the latest pmd plugin, it behaves better on failure (which it does for some 1.5 sources)

author: jdillon
msg: Move clover config props to dependencyManagement so they can be changed by child pom
